itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM Scale Set with Linux VMs running Scality Connect
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set of Linux VMs using Ubuntu Linux 16.04.4-LTS. These VMs are behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each VM will have Scality Connect running upon startup
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections
